training_data.Input: How do I update the Entity Component System in Unity? @searchBot
training_data.Output: @searchBot returned: To update the Entity Component System (ECS) in Unity, you need to create a System class that inherits from SystemBase or JobComponentSystem. Implement the OnUpdate() method to define the logic for updating your entities and components. Finally, add the [UpdateInGroup] attribute to the System class to specify the update order.
